vacancy_defect_distance.description: Distance between the guessed and actual fractional position of a vacancy defect in a supercell.

interstitial_defect_distance.description: Distance between the guessed and actual fractional position of an interstitial defect in a supercell.

anti_site_initial_distance.description: The initial distance between Ga and N atoms before exchange.

anti_site_defect_distance.description: The distance between the guessed anti-site defect position and the initial midpoint to verify the accuracy of the defect position.
